title: Day in Court (Rhonda Furmanek)
description:
A mom is murdered with her young girls in the next room. Now a witness, her 6-year-old daughter will walk into court more than once.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
